pyqgis_plugin.name: automate
pyqgis_plugin.description: Plug-in QGIS per progetti di infrastrutture gas [TEMPLATE PERSONALIZZATO]
pyqgis_plugin.about:
The AUTOMATE plugin for QGIS v2 is a comprehensive, modular toolkit for GIS-based gas infrastructure project design according to TENG specifications (Italgas Reti S.p.a.).
üöÄ VERSION 2 FEATURES: ‚Ä¢ Complete modular architecture for enhanced maintainability ‚Ä¢ Professional code organization with functional separation ‚Ä¢ Improved performance and reliability
üîß CORE FUNCTIONALITIES: ‚Ä¢ RG_COD Management: Manual generation and automated calculation with on/off toggle switch ‚Ä¢ PhotoEditor Integration: Advanced photo management with Google Street View API and custom editor ‚Ä¢ Attachment Management: Complete file handling system with trash management ‚Ä¢ Quality Control: Comprehensive project validation with custom reporting ‚Ä¢ Project Packaging: Automated zip creation for project submission ‚Ä¢ Configuration Management: Advanced settings and preferences system
üèóÔ∏è MODULAR ARCHITECTURE: ‚Ä¢ tools/rg_cod/: RG code generation system with automation control ‚Ä¢ tools/photo/: Photo management and editing capabilities ‚Ä¢ tools/attachments/: File attachment and deletion system ‚Ä¢ tools/controller/: Quality assurance and validation tools ‚Ä¢ tools/settings/: Configuration dialogs and preferences ‚Ä¢ tools/zip/: Project compression and progress tracking ‚Ä¢ core/: Shared utilities and configuration management ‚Ä¢ database/: Centralized database connectivity and models
The plugin seamlessly integrates into QGIS interface with a dedicated toolbar for efficient workflow management.
pyqgis_plugin.tags: python, gas infrastructure, project design, automation, photo management, quality control, modular architecture, italgas
